settings.colection_despc: Our unique protein blends mix high quality protein with a powerful mix of supperfoods, adaptogens and amino acids tailored to your needs.

settings.question1: When should I use the product?
settings.answer1: Ideally, post-workout to start the repair and recovery process. However, you can also use it to make a quick nutritious shake or smoothie anytime of the day, or in your porridge or oatmeal to top up your daily protein intake. The protein blend is also versatile enough to bake into high-protein snacks.
settings.question2: How long will the product last?
settings.answer2: This depends on how often you use the product. Typically a pouch of our protein blends will last around a month or so. If you're using it every day and also adding it to porridge and smoothies, you may run out sooner. We have a subscription option, which saves you money and ensures you'll never run out.
settings.question3: What does it taste like?
settings.answer3: All our protein blends come in either creamy vanilla or smooth chocolate. We spent months perfecting the flavour systems to create our own completely custom flavours that you won't get anywhere else. The flavours are characterised by complex layers of vanilla and cocoa, with subtle notes of caramel and biscuit. We only use natural flavours and you can adjust the sweetness down or up by using more or less liquid.
settings.question4: What sort of testing do you do?
settings.answer4: We go over and above to ensure you get the best quality and safest products possible. We only use ingredients that have a visible supply chain, and our manufacturing facilities are approved to the highest regulatory standards. Once we receive ingredients, we batch test every single one before it gets approval to go into the manufacturing process. That isn’t technically an official requirement but it’s something that we think should be.

settings.question1: When should I use the product?
settings.answer1:
The Power Booster anytime during the day or before your workout.
The Energy Booster right before and/or during your workout.
The Detox Booster works well as a morning/afternoon pick-me-up.
The Define Booster anytime during the day but morning works well.
settings.question2: How many servings do I get?
settings.answer2:
Based on taking each product every day as recommended:

The Power Booster will last 60 days.
The Energy Booster will last 30 days.
The Detox Booster will last 60 days.
The Define Booster will last 100 days.
settings.question3: Can I mix and match products?
settings.answer3: Yes, absolutely. We developed all our products so that you can mix and match any of them depending on your individual goals and needs. You will get the benefits of each of them regardless of whether you're taking them alone or with any of our other products.

Once we receive ingredients, we batch test every single one before it gets approval to go into the manufacturing process. That isn’t technically an official requirement but it’s something that we think should be.

settings.question1: When should I use the product?
settings.answer1:
The Recover Capsules after your workout or before bed.
The Focus Capsules when you wake up in the morning.
The Tone Capsules with your breakfast or lunch.
The Digest Capsules before your main meal of the day.
The Relax Capsules before you go to bed at night.
settings.question2: How many servings do I get?
settings.answer2: Each of our capsule products contain 60 capsules. We recommend that you take 2 capsules a day. So each product will last you exactly 30 days.

settings.answer3: Yes, absolutely. We developed all our products so that you can mix and match any of them depending on your individual goals and needs. You will get the benefits of each of them regardless of whether you're taking them alone or with any of our other products.

settings.paragraph1: Protein is a macronutrient that’s necessary for healthy muscles, skin, nails and bones. Whey protein concentrate and isolate are loaded with the essential amino acids that your body needs to build muscle mass efficiently. Casein, a slower-digesting protein, is another great source to boost muscle growth and aid recovery.
settings.paragraph2: Montmorency cherries and bilberries are both active ingredients that are high in antioxidants, with anti-aging and anti-inflammatory properties. With these nutritional qualities, the bioactives found in The Strong Protein can ease the body’s recovery process while promoting better cardiovascular health. They belong to a class of ingredients with wide-reaching health benefits.
settings.paragraph3: Magnesium and creatine monohydrate are effective ingredients with properties that help your body maximise physical performance and recover efficiently. Magnesium is necessary for energy creation, protein formation and muscle movements, while creatine monohydrate increases strength, power and muscle endurance.

settings.question1: When will I start to see results?
settings.answer1: This depends on your diet and exercise regime. You should be able to start feeling the results in a couple of weeks provided you keep to a consistent exercise routine and a healthy diet.
settings.question2: How often should I take it?
settings.answer2: At Innermost we believe in a food-first approach. For that reason, we recommend taking The Strong Protein as part of a balanced diet ideally post-workout or during your day as a healthy snack to meet your protein needs. You should always aim to meet most of your nutrient needs through the food you eat but having a high-quality protein powder like The Strong Protein, which contains additional ingredients to support your goals can be an efficient way to help fill gaps in your diet.
settings.question3: Does it have a complete amino acid profile?
settings.answer3: Yes! The Strong Protein provides a complete amino acid profile per serving as follows: Leucine (3.0g), Isoleucine (2.0g), Valine (1.9g), Alanine (1.6g), Arginine (0.7g), Aspartic Acid (3.5g), Cystine (0.7g), Glutamic Acid (5.6g), Glycine (0.4g), Histidine (0.5g), Lysine (2.9g), Methionine (0.7g), Phenylalanine (0.9g), Proline (1.7g), Serine (1.5g), Threonine (2.1g), Tryptophan (0.4g), Tyrosine (0.8g).
settings.question4: Can I take creatine with The Strong Protein?
settings.answer4: Whilst The Strong Protein does contain creatine, you can increase your intake – especially if you’d like to have a loading phase. You should also take creatine on days you’re not having The Strong Protein to ensure you’re getting your recommended daily dose.

settings.question1: Is this good for post-workout recovery?
settings.answer1: All our protein blends are perfect to help for recovery and repair but The Fit Protein in particular contains a selection of ingredients including important electrolytes that are lost when you sweat. It’s the ideal protein blend for anyone who is working out hard, doing a lot of aerobic activity or needs help raising their energy levels.
settings.question2: How often should I take it?
settings.answer2: At Innermost we believe in a food-first approach. For that reason, we recommend taking The Fit Protein as part of a balanced diet ideally post-workout or during your day as a healthy snack to meet your protein needs. You should always aim to meet most of your nutrient needs through the food you eat but having a high-quality protein powder like The Fit Protein, which contains additional ingredients to support your goals can be an efficient way to help fill gaps in your diet.
settings.question3: Does it have a complete amino acid profile?
settings.answer3: Yes! The Fit Protein provides a complete amino acid profile per serving as follows: Leucine (3.0g), Isoleucine (1.9g), Valine (1.9g), Alanine (1.5g), Arginine (0.7g), Aspartic Acid (3.4g), Cystine (0.7g), Glutamic Acid (5.4g), Glycine (0.4g), Histidine (0.5g), Lysine (2.9g), Methionine (0.6g), Phenylalanine (0.9g), Proline (1.6g), Serine (1.4g), Threonine (2.0g), Tryptophan (0.4g), Tyrosine (0.8g).
settings.question4: Will The Fit Protein make me bulky?
settings.answer4: No! ‘Bulkiness’ is a result of continuous muscle training usually employing heavy weights and a specific high-calorie diet, and can take a lot of effort and time. In reality, protein keeps you fuller for longer so it can actually help you get more toned and defined alongside a sensible diet and physical activity.

settings.question1: Is this a meal replacement?
settings.answer1: Our protein blends are not designed to be consumed asa meal replacement, but instead as a healthy addition to a balanced diet. They’re great as a post-workout refuel to start the recovery process - or just whenever you’re feeling peckish! If you’re looking for something filling that keeps you going until your next meal, consider blending up a protein smoothie with some healthy fruit and vegetables. Sign-up to our email newsletter and we’ll send over some recipes.
settings.question2: How often should I take it?
settings.answer2: At Innermost we believe in a food-first approach. For that reason, we recommend taking The Health Protein as part of a balanced diet ideally post-workout or during your day as a healthy snack to meet your protein needs. You should always aim to meet most of your nutrient needs through the food you eat but having a high-quality protein powder like The Health Protein, which contains additional ingredients to support your goals can be an efficient way to help fill gaps in your diet.
settings.question3: Does it have a complete amino acid profile?
settings.answer3: Yes! The Health Protein provides a complete amino acid profile per serving as follows: Leucine (2.8g), Isoleucine (1.8g), Valine (1.6g), Alanine (1.4g), Arginine (0.6g), Aspartic Acid (3.4g), Cystine (0.6g), Glutamic Acid (5.4g), Glycine (0.4g), Histidine (0.5g), Lysine (2.7g), Methionine (0.6g), Phenylalanine (0.8g), Proline (1.5g), Serine(1.4g), Threonine (2.0g), Tryptophan (0.4g), Tyrosine (0.7g).
settings.question4: Can I use The Health Protein in cooking or baking?
settings.answer4: Yes, it’s a great way of changing up how you enjoy your protein. You can check out some healthy protein recipes on our Insight blog!

settings.question1: Is this a meal replacement?
settings.answer1: Our protein blends are not designed to be consumed as a meal replacement, but instead as a healthy addition to a balanced diet. They’re great as a post-workout refuel to start the recovery process - or just whenever you’re feeling peckish! If you’re looking for something filling that keeps you going until your next meal, consider blending up a protein smoothie with some healthy fruit and vegetables. Sign-up to our email newsletter and we’ll send over some recipes.
settings.question2: How often should I take it?
settings.answer2: At Innermost we believe in a food-first approach. For that reason, we recommend taking The Lean Protein as part of a balanced diet ideally post-workout or during your day as a healthy snack to meet your protein needs. You should always aim to meet most of your nutrient needs through the food you eat but having a high-quality protein powder like The Lean Protein, which contains additional ingredients to support your goals can be an efficient way to help fill gaps in your diet.
settings.question3: Does it have a complete amino acid profile?
settings.answer3: Yes! The Lean Protein provides a complete amino acid profile per serving as follows: Leucine (2.9g), Isoleucine (1.9g), Valine (1.8g), Alanine (1.6g), Arginine (0.7g), Aspartic Acid (3.4g), Cystine (0.7g), Glutamic Acid (5.5g), Glycine (0.4g), Histidine (0.5g), Lysine (2.8g), Methionine (0.7g), Phenylalanine (0.9g), Proline (1.7g), Serine(1.5g), Threonine (2.0g), Tryptophan (0.4g), Tyrosine (0.7g).
settings.question4: Will The Lean Protein make me bulky?
settings.answer4: No! ‘Bulkiness’ is a result of continuous muscle training usually employing heavy weights and a specific high-calorie diet, and can take a lot of effort and time. In reality, protein keeps you fuller for longer so it can actually help you get more toned and defined alongside a sensible diet and physical activity.

settings.question1: How should I take it to see optimal results?
settings.answer1: Studies have shown that a creatine loading phase where you double the daily dosage for a period of a week before reverting to the standard daily recommended dose could help maximise its effects so you notice the results more quickly.
settings.question2: Can I add this to my protein shakes?
settings.answer2: Yes absolutely, you can enjoy The Power Booster with your shakes or any other liquid of your choice. It doesn't matter if you take it before or after your workout. As long as you take it daily, you'll notice the benefits.
settings.question3: What workouts does it help with?
settings.answer3: The Power Booster is particularly beneficial for exercises that require explosive power, such as weight-lifting, HIIT workouts or sprinting.

settings.question1: Can I take it on an empty stomach?
settings.answer1: Absolutely - in fact it’s a great way to get the most out of fasted cardio workouts when your energy levels might be lower than usual but you still want to get a great workout regardless. The added BCAAs will ensure you're not breaking down muscle and focuses your body on burning fat for energy.
settings.question2: Will I get a tingling sensation after taking it?
settings.answer2: Some people don't get it while others may. If you do feel slight tingles, don’t worry this is completely normal, and just an effect of the beta alanine. It lets you know the product is working. If you do get it, it will pass within half an hour or so.
settings.question3: Can I use it on days when I’m not working out?
settings.answer3: The Energy Booster has been formulated as a pre-workout product to provide shorter term energy boost during workouts, so for best results we’d recommend using it before your workouts.

settings.question1: Do I have to take it with water?
settings.answer1: The Detox Booster can be enjoyed hot or cold, mixed up any way you like! We love it with everything from cold apple juice to smoothies. Another great choice is heating it in a saucepan with warm almond milk until it mixes in before adding a squeeze of honey. Delicious!
settings.question2: Can I use this with other products?
settings.answer2: Absolutely! Look at The Detox Booster as you would a matcha latte or a way to supercharge your smoothie creations. It's an incredible product to enjoy as part of your journey to greater health.
settings.question3: What does The Detox Booster taste like?
settings.answer3: The Detox Booster has a super green taste, the most prominent flavours being matcha and peppermint.

settings.question1: Do I have to take it alongside a workout?
settings.answer1: You don’t have to be working out to take The Define Booster - you can take it whenever you want, even on non-workout days.
settings.question2: What does The Define Booster taste like?
settings.answer2: The Define Booster has a tart, almost citrusy flavour (naturally). Think lemon water.
settings.question3: Can I mix it with other products?
settings.answer3: You can absolutely take The Define Booster alongside any other Innermost product, though due to its tartness we’d recommend having it separately in a glass of cold water with a squeeze of lemon juice.

settings.question1: Is this product only for when I’m injured?
settings.answer1: No, the Recover Capsules are packed with vital nutrients, minerals and vitamins that support bodily function in a number of different ways. Not only should help you avoid getting injured and support faster recovery from your workouts, they also contain ingredients such as vitamin D and selenium, which support a healthy immune system and regulate optimal hormone activity.
settings.question2: Can I take them when pregnant?
settings.answer2: As with all nutritional supplements, it’s always best to speak with your doctor first if you're pregnant or breastfeeding as they’ll have more knowledge on your individual circumstances.
settings.question3: Are The Recover Capsules vegan?
settings.answer3: Yes, all of our capsules are vegan. They’re also free of GMO, and contain no fillers, bulking agents or artificial colours. What you see if what you get!

settings.question1: Can I take them in the evening?
settings.answer1: Yes! While The Focus Capsules should help you concentrate and improve mental processing speed, they are non-stimulant, so they won’t keep you up into the early hours if you want to catch up on some work later in the evening.

settings.paragraph1: Protein is a macronutrient that’s necessary for healthy muscles, skin, nails and bones. Whey protein concentrate and isolate are loaded with the essential amino acids that your body needs to build muscle mass efficiently. As a high-quality source of protein, whey also lowers blood pressure, decreases inflammation and reduces cravings.
settings.paragraph2: Maca and rhodiola root contain properties that reduce physical stress, increase endurance and decrease fatigue. They are a part of a select group of ingredients that also support focus and performance. Nootropics have many other helpful effects to improve your fitness, such as boosting motivation and energy.
settings.paragraph3: Cocomineral, magnesium and pink Himalayan sea salt are ingredients that help hydrate your body and support energy production. They also balance electrolytes, which allows your muscles and blood pressure to function properly. Keeping these key nutrients in check not only optimises the body during exercise, but throughout recovery.

settings.paragraph1: Protein is a macronutrient that’s necessary for healthy muscles, skin, nails and bones. A combination of brown rice protein and pea protein makes up the perfect amino acid profile, allowing your muscles to repair, recover and develop at an optimal level. Glutamine is an additional amino acid that protects the immune system to provide stamina and strength.
settings.paragraph2: Bilberries, camu camu and acai berries are active ingredients that are high in antioxidants, with anti-aging and anti-inflammatory properties. With these nutritional qualities, the bioactives found in The Health Protein can ease the body’s recovery process while promoting better cardiovascular health. They belong to a class of ingredients with wide-reaching health benefits.
settings.paragraph3: While medicinal mushrooms have been studied and utilised throughout history, they have recently attracted popularity due to their nutritional benefits. Shiitake mushrooms are being studied as a treatment for viral infections, Maitake mushrooms have been shown to prevent illness, Reishi mushrooms help the body deal with stress and Cordyceps have renowned antioxidant and antibacterial properties.

settings.paragraph1: Protein is a macronutrient that’s necessary for healthy muscles, skin, nails and bones. Whey protein concentrate and isolate are loaded with the essential amino acids that your body needs to build muscle mass efficiently. As a high-quality source of protein, whey also lowers blood pressure, decreases inflammation and reduces cravings.
settings.paragraph2: Pomegranates, yerba mate, bilberries and inulin are active ingredients that provide wide-reaching health benefits. Inulin and pomegranates have properties that encourage the growth of good bacteria, while bilberries and yerba mate are rich in antioxidants. These bioactives have been shown to positively affect weight management through their different properties.
settings.paragraph3: Acetyl l-carnitine is functional for both your physical and mental health. By transporting fatty acids to the mitochondria, the supplement is effective when it comes to improving memory, increasing endurance and reducing fatigue. It allows your body to burn fat for energy, so that your workouts are optimised for muscle health and development.

settings.paragraph1: Creatine monohydrate is a functional compound that contains similar properties to amino acids, as it’s naturally found in the body and promotes muscle strength and development. It allows your body to produce more of ATP, which is a high-energy molecule. This boosts performance and improves cellular processes that increase muscle mass.

Branched-chain amino acids (BCAAs), citrulline malate and beta alanine are amino acids that are vital for muscle maintenance and energy regulation. BCAAs are known for their role in muscle growth and repair. Citrulline malate allows the body to increase blood flow, maximising endurance. Beta alanine is shown to increase TTE (time to exhaustion), and reduce fatigue.
settings.paragraph2: The B vitamins have an effect on many of the body’s functions, but are best known to help boost your mood and reduce fatigue. While they have a direct impact on energy levels and cell metabolism, they also support good digestion, healthy brain function, cardiovascular health and muscle tone.
settings.paragraph3: Maca, guarana and caffeine contain properties that reduce physical stress, which increases endurance and decreases fatigue. They are a part of a select group of ingredients that also support focus and performance. Nootropics have many other helpful effects to improve your fitness, such as boosting motivation and energy.

settings.paragraph1: Turmeric, cocoa, camu camu, peppermint and wheatgrass are all ingredients that are derived from plants and support overall health. They are high in antioxidants and anti-inflammatory, meaning they have properties that protect the body against viral and bacterial infections. Individually, they also have other positive effects on the body, such as improved digestion and anti-aging properties.
settings.paragraph2: Spirulina, chlorella and kelp are different kinds of algae that are bioavailable sources of key nutrients, making them ingredients that protect your immune system. Spirulina is rich in vitamins B1, B2 and B3. Chlorella is packed with iron and vitamin B12. Kelp absorbs nutrients from its aquatic environment, such as zinc and iodine.
settings.paragraph3: Maca and matcha green tea contain properties that reduce physical stress, increase endurance and decrease fatigue. They are a part of a select group of ingredients that also support focus and performance. Nootropics have many other helpful effects to improve your fitness, such as boosting motivation and energy.

settings.paragraph1: Acety l-carnitine is a substance natural to the body that serves an important role in the burning of fat for energy, and ferrying fatty acids across the walls of the mitochondria, where they are oxidised and turned into energy. On its return trip from inside the mitochondria, it brings back acetyl groups and other small fragments produced in fatty acid oxidation. Carnitine's role in fat metabolism leads it to affect, in some degree, all the other energy metabolism in the cell, including the burning of carbohydrates. Some researchers have suggested that its important role in the burning of fat also makes it useful in diets for weight loss.

ZMA, ubiquinone CoQ10, selenium and vitamin D all play a role in metabolism, muscle growth and immune system function. ZMA and ubiquinone CoQ10 also promote energy levels, while selenium and vitamin D have been shown to protect the body from disease and infection.
settings.paragraph2: Chocamine is a naturally active ingredient that provides wide-reaching health benefits due to its rich amino acid profile, nutritious minerals and flavanols. The amino acids and minerals promote increased energy, endurance and stamina, while flavanols promote healthy circulation and muscle growth. It also has been shown to improve mood and concentration.
settings.paragraph3: Maca contains properties that reduce physical stress, which increase endurance and decrease fatigue. They are a part of a select group of ingredients that also support focus and performance. Nootropics have many other helpful effects to improve your fitness, such as boosting motivation and energy.

settings.paragraph1: Rhodiola rosea, CDP-choline and bacopa monnieri contain properties that reduce physical stress, increase endurance and decrease fatigue. They are a part of a select group of ingredients that also support focus and performance. Nootropics have many other helpful effects to improve your fitness, such as boosting motivation and energy.
settings.paragraph2: L-tyrosine is an amino acid that helps brain function by producing chemicals that regulate nerve cells. It helps improve mood by assisting in the production of dopamine, or our happy hormone. It can increase mental capacity if taken before a stressful situation, as it has an effect on your fight-or-flight response.
settings.paragraph3: Siberian ginseng is an Asian herb that is considered an adaptogen, as it helps the body’s ability to deal with stress. While it was traditionally used to prevent cold and flu symptoms, it's been shown to increase energy and enhance thinking with evidence suggesting that it can benefit both mental and physical performance.

settings.paragraph1: Vitamin C, vitamin B6 and vitamin B12 all impact a variety of systems within the body. Vitamin C not only supports immunity, but it allows your body to efficiently absorb fat molecules to produce energy. Vitamins B6 and B12 also help increase energy while stimulating metabolism and regulating the circulatory and nervous systems.
settings.paragraph2: Alpha Lipoic Acid and L-theanine are ingredients often used for weight management. Alpha lipoic acid is not only high in antioxidants, but it can reduce the activity of an enzyme that increases feelings of hunger. L-theanine can help with stress relief, blood pressure management and increased mental focus.
settings.paragraph3: Yerba mate, matcha green tea and capsicum are naturally active ingredients that are high in antioxidants. Yerba mate has shown to reduce the total number of fat cells, while capsicum increases metabolism and improves digestion. Matcha green tea has proven benefits from boosting energy to increasing fat burning.

settings.paragraph1: Acacia fibre and Lactospore® decrease inflammation within the gut and enhance the absorption of nutrients. Specifically, Lactospore® is a probiotic (good gut bacteria), while Acacia fibre is a prebiotic, which feeds said bacteria. These ingredients combine to encourage a healthier and happier gut.
settings.paragraph2: Digezyme® is a blend of five digestive enzymes. They support healthy digestion while optimising the breakdown of fats, proteins and carbohydrates. Because of their ability to help your body process difficult-to-digest foods, they also help with bloating, indigestion, constipation and other uncomfortable stomach issues.
settings.paragraph3: Ginger root is a naturally active ingredient with a long history of use for positive health reasons. Besides having powerful medicinal properties, ginger is high in antioxidants and has anti-inflammatory qualities, which supports the immune system. It also can speed up the digestion process, which can help ease symptoms of indigestion.

settings.paragraph1: L-theanine and L-glycine are both amino acids, which are organic compounds that assist with a variety of functions within the body. L-theanine has been proven to promote relaxation, regulate sleep patterns and boost the immune system, while L-glycine improves the quality of sleep, protects the heart and reduces the feeling of stress within the body.
settings.paragraph2: Ashwagandha, lion’s mane mushroom and valerian root are all substances derived from plants. Ashwagandha is known for its restorative and rejuvenating benefits, while valerian root and lion’s mane mushroom have been shown to reduce the symptoms of anxiety. These plant-based ingredients are helpful when it comes to sleep hygiene.
settings.paragraph3: 5-HTP is an amino acid that assists in the production of serotonin. This increased production can help ease symptoms of anxiety, depression and sleep disorders. 5-HTP can also increase the amount of melatonin within the body, which helps regulate sleep.

settings.question1: Can I take this with other Innermost products?
settings.answer1: Absolutely, you can combine products across different ranges in any way you see fit - whatever works best for helping you achieve your specific goals.
settings.question2: When will I start to see results?
settings.answer2: This depends on your diet and exercise regime. You should be able to start feeling the results in a couple of weeks provided you keep to a consistent exercise routine and a healthy diet.
settings.question3: When should I use the products?
settings.answer3: At Innermost we believe in a food first approach. For that reason, we recommend taking The Strong Protein as part of a balanced diet ideally post-workout or during your day as a healthy snack to meet your protein needs. You should always aim to meet most of your nutrient needs through the food you eat but having a high-quality protein powder like The Strong Protein, which contains additional ingredients to support your goals can be an efficient way to help fill gaps in your diet. As for the other two products in The Muscle Collection, we’d recommend taking The Power Booster daily, anytime during the day. The Recover Capsules should be taken every day ideally post-workout or before you go to bed.

settings.question1: What are the benefits of the Collection?
settings.answer1: The Muscle Collection represents a way to save money while picking up the full range of products to support strength, power and recovery. You'll also get an Innermost shaker bottle.
settings.question2: What sort of testing do you do?
settings.answer2: We go over and above to ensure you get the best quality and safest products possible. We only use ingredients that have a visible supply chain, and our manufacturing facilities are approved to the highest regulatory standards. Once we receive ingredients, we batch test every single one before it gets approval to go into the manufacturing process. That isn’t technically an official requirement but it’s something that we think should be.

settings.question1: Can I put this in the dishwasher?
settings.answer1: Yes, you can put every part of the shaker in the dishwasher.
settings.question2: Can I use my shaker for drinks other than shakes?
settings.answer2: Definitely, your shaker can be used for absolutely anything. The whisk is removable for when you don’t need the extra blending.
settings.question3: Does the shaker leak at all?
settings.answer3: The shaker is 100% leakproof, safe for any gym bag. Just be sure to screw the lid on tightly.

settings.question1: Is the Innermost Tote machine washable?
settings.answer1: Yes it is - keep it on a low temp (eg 30C) for best results.
settings.question2: Is the Innermost Tote big enough to use as a gym bag?
settings.answer2: Depending on how much kit you take with you, the bag should be able to hold everything you need for a great session, whilst fitting easily into lockers too.
settings.question3: Does it come in different designs?
settings.answer3: Yes! Choose the words you'd like printed on one side of the tote bag from the choices available in the dropdown.

settings.question1: How big is the bag?
settings.answer1: Our Innermost duffel bag measures 18" x 10.5" x 10.5". That means it’s roomy enough for all your workout and last-minute getaway needs.
settings.question2: Does it come in different colours?
settings.answer2: We have a number of different shades with plans to launch a number of special editions. Sign up to our newsletter to be the first to hear and email us if there are any particular colours you'd like to see in the future.
settings.question3: How durable is it?
settings.answer3: Our Innermost duffel bags are made from high-quality 100% polyester with a water repellent outer and double-stitched for extra durability.

settings.question1: What material is it made of?
settings.answer1: A super soft cotton blend and soft brushed inside for a luxurious and comfortable feel. The sweaters are made of 80% ring-spun cotton and 20% polyester to give you that soft but stretchy feel.
settings.question2: What are the care instructions?
settings.answer2: Machine wash cold with like colours on a normal cycle only. It's a good idea not to bleach or tumble dry the sweatshirts to maintain the finish and size. Also, please avoid ironing the logo designs.

settings.About_para_2:
We’ve all heard a bunch of BS on how to be healthier. Asking for help can often lead to confusing explanations, contradictory advice, and the latest must-try fad.

We had enough and we think you have too.

At Innermost, we use science to make decisions, not trends. We know the best way to get healthier is with evidence-based science, not fads. So we’ve built a new approach – one that cuts through the confusion and supports you on your journey to better health by offering access to experts, education, advice and evidence-based nutrition products.

We use science, research, as well as best practices from Ayurvedic and Asian medicine to craft products that put you in charge of your health – not the other way around.

Developed to address your needs across body and mind so you can take control of your health and feel great.

Our nutritional supplements work synergistically to give you the best possible results. They fit seamlessly into your daily routine targeting individual needs across body and mind unlike one-dimensional generics. And they taste great. Really great. Just ask our customers.
settings.About_para_3: Whatever you need, we've got you covered.

settings.About_para_2:
You should know exactly what’s in your nutritional supplements. That’s why we stick to a strict set of values when it comes to crafting our products and only use the highest quality ingredients that are easiest for your body to digest with no additives, colours, fillers, soy. gluten or GMO nasties.

We understand that the path to better health is different for everyone. No matter what social media shows you, it takes commitment. We’re here to make sure you stay the course with the right advice, support and products for you.
settings.About_para_3: The road to better health is a journey.

settings.author_description: A few years ago, Shiv had a crazy idea to create and launch a wellness brand called Innermost. Like that'll ever work. When he's not bouncing around ideas or talking strategy with the team, you’ll find him listening to obscure podcasts, sweating it up in the gym, listening to 90s rap music, or pretending to be a fire engine for his beautiful little niece and nephew.

When Robyn isn't researching and interviewing people for articles or learning about the intricacies of search engine optimisation, you can find her practicing her yoga poses, binge watching Netflix series, spending far too much time watching TikTok, or experimenting with new recipes. Have something interesting to say? She'd love to hear from you.

Allison has a passion for all things creative, making writing and graphic design the two favourite parts of her social media focused role. Since moving to London from Texas, she’s found a love for adventuring and stepping out of her comfort zone. She loves dancing, diving into a Netflix series and face-timing her pup. Just don't ask her about US politics. There's some things ya'll just don't talk about.

Cash loves numbers. Preferably organised in way that tells a story. She spends her time in the office diving deep into data, as well as handling all those exciting non-spammy emails you receive from us. On her days off, she can be found sweating over culinary creations in the kitchen, or embarrassing herself on the dance floor (her living room will do just fine for now, thanks Covid).

During working hours, you can find Caitlin executing partnerships, pitching ideas to press, and chatting it up with our ambassadors. Outside of work, you’ll catch her hyping herself up to enter the gym weights room (gals, you know the feeling), glued to a fitness YouTuber’s “Day in the Life” vlog, or chopping up veg for a bowl of ramen. Gordon Ramsay, eat your heart out.

Beth has a first class BA English Language and Applied Linguistics degree. That means she knows how to write really good. When she's not reading, researching or writing for Innermost, you can find her managing her Depop empire. Looking for a black one shoulder crop top tank vest that's machine washable and only been worn once? She's got you.

At Innermost, we believe that a holistic approach to physical and mental wellbeing is the path to living a more inspired life. We empower people to think, feel and perform their best, whoever and wherever they are on their journey. We encourage everyone to embrace their individuality and realise the greatest versions of themselves. Be bold. Be bright. Be different.

settings.title: The Fit Protein
settings.subtitle:
Whey protein
blend for
performance
settings.description_text:
Formulated to improve performance, speed up recovery and support lean muscle development.
Lacking energy is something lots of people complain about. We wanted to help with that. This protein blend was developed for people who want to push themselves further, and improve performance in and out of the gym.
settings.list_text_1:
Protein:

A blend of dairy-based whey concentrate and isolate for repair, recovery and lean muscle development.
settings.list_text_2:
Cocomineral:

Powdered coconut water packed with potassium to rehydrate, combat tiredness and rebalance energy levels.
settings.list_text_3:
Maca:

Peruvian herb to reduce physical and mental stress while boosting energy, performance and libido.
settings.list_text_4:
Magnesium:

Mineral that contributes to electrolyte balance, energy, recovery, cardiac function, and bone and muscle health.
settings.list_text_5:
Rhodiola Root:

Flowering plant that helps reduce fatigue, manage stress and improve mental function.
settings.list_text_6:
Pink Himalayan Sea Salt:

Rock salt from the Punjab region of India, contains 84 trace minerals and elements to rehydrate the body.
settings.bottom_description_text:
A champion blend of 7 ingredients to improve performance, vitality and support lean muscle development.

"
Innermost is definitely the absolute best! Some protein shakes taste so artificial and have a weird after-taste but this tastes amazing. I’ve used it in different kinds of baking as well.*

*Verified customer review.

settings.title: The Strong Protein
settings.subtitle:
Whey protein
blend for
muscle
settings.description_text:
Formulated to maximise muscle gains, strength and power output.
Protein won’t automatically give you muscles. We had to be smarter than that, so we added ingredients to this protein blend to help you push yourself harder and speed up recovery with the aim of getting you stronger, quicker.
settings.list_text_1:
Protein:

A blend of dairy-based whey concentrate and isolate for repair, recovery and lean muscle development.
settings.list_text_2:
Casein:

Slow-digesting protein to encourage optimal protein uptake and absorption for muscle growth and repair.
settings.list_text_3:
Creatine Monohydrate:

Found naturally in muscle cells where it boosts strength, increases lean muscle mass and aids recovery.
settings.list_text_4:
Montmorency Cherries:

Variety of sour cherry with anti-inflammatory properties to help reduce damage from intensive exercise.
settings.list_text_5:
Bilberries:

Dark berry that assists with inflammation-fighting. Rich in antioxidants and resveratrol for cardiovascular health.
settings.list_text_6:
Magnesium:

Mineral that plays an important role in energy, recovery, cardiac function, and bone and muscle health.
settings.bottom_description_text:
A solid blend of 7 ingredients to maximise muscle gains, strength and power output.

"
It’s taken me ages to find a protein that tastes amazing and also fills me up. I use this regularly after my weight sessions and occasionally as a meal replacement.*

*Verified customer review

settings.title: The Health Protein
settings.subtitle:
Vegan protein
blend for
wellbeing
settings.description_text:
Formulated to to enhance overall health and support lean muscle development.
We wanted to create a vegan protein that had a perfectly balanced amino acid profile with added ingredients to support wellbeing and the immune system, without sacrificing taste and texture. We think we nailed it.
settings.list_text_1:
Vegan Protein:

A blend of plant-based pea and brown rice protein for repair, recovery and lean muscle development.
settings.list_text_2:
Glutamine:

One of the most abundant amino acids found in the body. Acts as the fuel of the immune system.
settings.list_text_3:
Shiitake, Maitake, Reishi, Cordyceps:

Japanese medicinal mushrooms used for their antiviral, antioxidant and antibacterial properties.
settings.list_text_4:
Bilberries:

Dark berry that assists with inflammation-fighting. Rich in antioxidants and resveratrol for cardiovascular health.
settings.list_text_5:
Camu Camu:

Amazonian berry packed with nutrients; the richest natural source of vitamin C.
settings.list_text_6:
Acai Berries:

Nutrient-dense purple berry native to Central and South America that offers brain health and anti-ageing benefits.
settings.bottom_description_text:
A sinless blend of 10 ingredients to enhance overall health and support lean muscle development.

"
Best tasting vegan protein powder bar none. Absolutely delicious, especially when mixed with almond or oat milk. I genuinely look forward to my post-workout shake.*

*Verified customer review.

settings.title: The Lean Protein
settings.subtitle:
Whey protein
blend for
weight-loss
settings.description_text:
Formulated to encourage healthy fat-loss and development of toned muscle.
Our protein blends won’t make you bulky. This one can actually help you slim-down. We want to make it easier to reach your ideal weight so we packed this protein blend with ingredients to support the fat-loss process.
settings.list_text_1:
Protein:

A blend of dairy-based whey concentrate and isolate for repair, recovery and lean muscle development.
settings.list_text_2:
Inulin:

Prebiotic fibre to encourage growth of good gut bacteria, linked to lower levels of fat.
settings.list_text_3:
Acetyl L-Carnitine:

Amino acid with non-stimulant fat-loss properties, associated with encouraging the body to metabolise fat for energy.
settings.list_text_4:
Pomegranates:

Distinctive red fruit that encourages growth of good gut bacteria that are linked to lower levels of fat.
settings.list_text_5:
Yerba Mate:

Dried leaves of an evergreen holly tree native to South America. Boosts metabolism and delays fat absorption.
settings.list_text_6:
Bilberries:

Dark berry that assists with inflammation-fighting. Rich in antioxidants and resveratrol for cardiovascular health.
settings.bottom_description_text:
A slick blend of 7 ingredients to encourage healthy fat-loss and support lean muscle development.

"
The best protein I’ve ever tasted. Be it a shake on its own or with any recipe, smoothie, overnight oats, pudding etc. After trying many different brands I’m sticking with this one!*

*Verified customer review.

settings.title: The Recover Capsules
settings.subtitle:
Daily nootropic
capsule for
faster recovery
settings.description_text:
Formulated to support recovery, hormone activity and promote energy.
Rest and recovery are important but often overlooked. We wanted to fix that problem with a product that supported the recovery process, reduced inflammation, regulated metabolism and boosted energy (and libido!).
settings.list_text_1:
Maca:

Peruvian herb to help reduce physical and mental stress while boosting energy, performance and libido.
settings.list_text_2:
ZMA:

Optimal balance of zinc, magnesium and vitamin B6 for energy, hormone activity and physical recovery.
settings.list_text_3:
Chocamine:

Cocoa extract that helps reduce inflammation, and regulate metabolism and muscle growth.
settings.list_text_4:
Ubiquinone COQ10:

Vitamin-like compound made in the body and used by cells to produce energy for growth and repair.
settings.list_text_5:
Selenium:

Essential mineral for brain function, as well as playing a key role in male and female fertility.
settings.list_text_6:
Vitamin D:

The sunshine vitamin for heathy bone, teeth and muscle health.
settings.bottom_description_text:
A mighty blend of 6 ingredients to support recovery, hormone activity and promote energy.

"
I find that my muscles aren’t as sore post-workout when I’m taking these capsules and I feel my energy levels are higher after a tough session. A definite must-have in my gym bag.*

*Verified customer review.

settings.title: The Focus Capsules
settings.subtitle:
Daily nootropic
complex for
enhanced focus
settings.description_text:
Formulated to increase focus under pressure and boost mental performance.
To perform your best, you have to be able to think on your feet even when you’re tired and under pressure. This product contains smart ingredients that increase focus and concentration whilst reducing mental fatigue.
settings.list_text_1:
Siberian Ginseng:

Plant used in herbal medicine to increase energy and alertness, and reduce mental and physical fatigue.
settings.list_text_2:
L-Tyrosine:

Amino acid that can reduce stress and prevent stress-induced memory and attention deficits.
settings.list_text_3:
Bacopa Monnieri:

A nootropic herb shown to improve cognition, by reducing anxiety, and improving memory formation.
settings.list_text_4:
CDP-Choline:

Nootropic compound that regulates memory and mood, and enhances cognitive performance and focus.
settings.list_text_5:
Rhodiola Root:

Flowering plant that helps boost mental processing, learning, attention span, and mood, whilst combatting fatigue.
settings.bottom_description_text:
A lively blend of 5 ingredients to increase focus under pressure and boost mental performance.

"
These capsules sounded too good to be true until I tried them. I feel I have better concentration when taking them and loads more energy.*

*Verified customer review.

settings.title: The Digest Capsules
settings.subtitle:
Daily nootropic
complex for
better gut health
settings.description_text:
Formulated to improve gut health and support digestive processes.
An unhealthy gut and poor digestion can lead to bloating, constipation, IBS and a range of serious health issues. These daily capsules contain probiotics and prebiotics to encourage the growth of good gut bacteria, with digestive enzymes and ginger to improve digestion and reduce bloating. Get healthier from the inside out.
settings.list_text_1:
Acacia Fibre:

A powerful prebiotic sourced from the sap of the Acacia tree. It feeds the good bacteria in your gut to help build a stronger and more diverse microbiome.
settings.list_text_2:
Ginger Root (5:1 Extract):

Anti-inflammatory, antibacterial and antiviral, ginger improves digestive processes, reducing constipation, bloating and indigestion.
settings.list_text_3:
Lactospore ®:

Probiotic bacteria from Bacillus coagulans. Helps to improve gut health and digestion, enhancing the absorption of nutrients and fighting inflammation in the body.
settings.list_text_4:
Digezyme ®:

A blend of 5 digestive enzymes, which assist in the breaking down and absorption of nutrients, while reducing constipation, bloating and indigestion.
settings.bottom_description_text:
A slick blend of 4 ingredients to improve digestive processes and improve gut health.

"
I have been taking it for a week+ but the difference in how my digestive system works is noticeable!*

*Verified customer review.

settings.title: The Tone Capsules
settings.subtitle:
Daily nootropic
complex for
sustainable fat-loss
settings.description_text:
Formulated to raise metabolism and support sustainable fat-loss.
Forget fad diets, they don’t work. This product contains evidence-based ingredients to raise your metabolism and promote healthy fat-loss in a sustainable way. People keep telling us that they love it. We think you will too.
settings.list_text_1:
Matcha Green Tea:

Ground green tea leaves bursting with compounds that offer multiple health benefits, from increased metabolism to boosted energy levels.
settings.list_text_2:
Yerba Mate:

Dried leaves of a South American evergreen holly tree. Boosts metabolism and delays fat absorption.
settings.list_text_3:
Vitamin C:

An important vitamin used to support the immune system. Also aids absorption of green tea compounds.
settings.list_text_4:
Alpha Lipoic Acid:

Naturally occurring compound with antioxidant properties that also assists with fat metabolisation.
settings.list_text_5:
Capsicum:

A compound with bioactive properties found in chilli peppers. Regular consumption can reduce abdominal fat and appetite.
settings.list_text_6:
L-Theanine:

Amino acid that can reduce stress hormone cortisol, which can lead to weight-gain.
settings.list_text_7:
Vitamin B6 & B12:

For the reduction of tiredness and fatigue and normal energy-yielding metabolism.
settings.bottom_description_text:
A sharp blend of 8 ingredients to raise metabolism and support sustainable fat-loss.

"
I love that it gives me a burst of energy without a racing heart or jitters. I’ve been taking it twice a day alongside my training and healthy eating. I’m already seeing great results.*

*Verified customer review.

settings.title: The Relax Capsules
settings.subtitle:
Daily nootropic
complex to
help you relax
settings.description_text:
Formulated to improve clarity, reduce stress and promote relaxation.
Life can be stressful, and stress causes all sorts of issues. This product contains research-backed ingredients that help you find some more zen in your life, encourage a better night’s sleep and boost your mood.
settings.list_text_1:
Lion's Mane Mushroom:

Medicinal mushroom that supports brain health, new learning and improved mood.
settings.list_text_2:
L-Glycine:

Amino acid and neurotransmitter which reduces symptoms of insomnia and restores healthy sleep patterns.
settings.list_text_3:
Ashwagandha:

A powerful and revered adaptogenic herb, used to help the body cope with stresses such as anxiety and insomnia.
settings.list_text_4:
Valerian Root:

Medicinal herbal used to reduce the symptoms of anxiety and for the relief of sleep disturbances.
settings.list_text_5:
5-HTP (Griffonia Seed Extract):

Naturally occurring amino acid derived from the seed of the Griffonia plant that helps improve mood and regulate sleep cycles.
settings.list_text_6:
L-Theanine:

A relaxing but non-sedative amino acid that has been shown to help reduce cortisol levels in the body (the stress hormone).
settings.bottom_description_text:
A chill blend of 5 ingredients to improve clarity, reduce stress and promote relaxation.

"
I‘ve been taking this product for about two weeks now and I have to say that I’ve definitely noticed the effects. Long may the relaxed feeling continue.*

*Verified customer review.

settings.title: The Power Booster
settings.subtitle:
100% pure
micronised creatine
monohydrate
settings.description_text:
Formulated to boost power and endurance.
The reason that creatine monohydrate is the most popular sports supplement is because everyone agrees that it works. The go-to product for athletes and gym-goers looking to increase power, strength and speed.
settings.list_text_1:
Creatine Monohydrate:

Increases lean muscle mass and aids recovery. Recommended for those undertaking high intensity exercise.
settings.bottom_description_text:
Just 1 powerful ingredient to boost power and endurance. Perfect for high-intensity training.

"
I’ve definitely noticed a change in the gym when I’m working out. I can lift heavier and I don’t get tired as quickly. Mixes really easily too. Love it!*

*Verified customer review.

settings.title: The Energy Booster
settings.subtitle:
Pre/intra-workout
powder with
added BCAAs
settings.description_text:
Formulated to raise energy levels, stamina and preserve lean muscle.
We set out to create the most effective pre-workout product on the market that wasn’t packed with crazy amounts of caffeine. Did we succeed? Men’s Health awarded it Best Pre-workout in their Sports Nutrition Awards.
settings.list_text_1:
BCAA Complex:

The key essential amino acids (leucine, valine and isoleucine) in an optimal ratio to aid muscle growth and recovery.
settings.list_text_2:
Citrulline Malate:

Amino acid combined with organic salt to improve aerobic and anaerobic performance during prolonged exercise.
settings.list_text_3:
Maca:

Peruvian herb to help reduce physical and mental stress while boosting energy, performance and libido.
settings.list_text_4:
Beta Alanine:
Naturally occurring amino acid that can reduce effects of fatigue and delay onset of lactic acid in the muscles.
settings.list_text_5:
Guarana:

Seeds of an Amazonian plant regarded as the elixir of long life. Improves alertness, memory and performance.
settings.list_text_6:
Caffeine:

Improves alertness, mood, cognitive function and physical performance, as well as supporting fat-loss.
settings.list_text_7:
Vitamin B Complex:

All eight B vitamins that assist the body’s metabolic and energy processes.
settings.bottom_description_text:
A winning blend of 16 ingredients to raise energy levels, stamina and preserve lean muscle.

"
I’m hooked. I get a fantastic pick-up right before my workouts, which are noticeably more intense now. Cannot recommend this product enough.*

*Verified customer review.

settings.title: The Detox Booster
settings.subtitle:
Vegan superfood
powder
blend
settings.description_text:
Formulated to promote wellbeing and immunity. A natural and effective detox and cleanse.
Got a cupboard full of amazing healthy ingredients that you never use? We know the feeling. To make life easier, we created a product containing the most highly-regarded superfoods in one easy to use powder.
settings.list_text_1:
Maca:

Peruvian herb to help reduce physical and mental stress while boosting energy, performance and libido.
settings.list_text_2:
Matcha Green Tea:

Green tea leaves bursting with compounds that improve energy, skin, focus as well as aiding fat loss and protecting against heart disease.
settings.list_text_3:
Camu Camu:

Amazonian berry packed with nutrients; the richest natural source of vitamin C.
settings.list_text_4:
Spirulina:

Blue-green algae with potent antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties.
settings.list_text_5:
Peppermint:

Plant with distinctive tasting leaves that help calm the mind and aid digestion.
settings.list_text_6:
Wheatgrass:

Freshly sprouted leaves of the wheat plant with a rich vitamin and mineral profile.
settings.list_text_8:
Chlorella:

Green algae packed with nutrients and minerals, to support health and immunity.
settings.list_text_9:
Kelp:

Large brown algae that helps detox and protect the body.
settings.list_text_10:
Turmeric:

Plant root with anti-inflammatory properties, supporting immunity.
settings.bottom_description_text:
A fresh combo of 10 ingredients to promote wellbeing and immunity. A natural and effective detox and cleanse.

"
Such a great-tasting product. You can just feel all the goodness. I have it as a tea with almond milk but it’s also good when mixed into smoothies and shakes.*

*Verified customer review.

settings.title: The Define Booster
settings.subtitle:
100% pure
acetyl
l-carnitine
settings.description_text:
Formulated to metabolise fat, support energy and improve definition.
To decrease body-fat you need the right nutrients. That’s where this product comes in. The most popular non-stimulant fat-loss supplement around that works to ensure your body can metabolise fat efficiently.
settings.list_text_1:
Acetyl L-Carnitine:

One of the most popular non-stimulant fat-loss supplements on the market. A non-essential amino acid found naturally in the human body where it helps transport fat to the body’s cells to be used as energy during physical activity.
settings.bottom_description_text:
Just 1 cool ingredient to metabolise fat, support energy and improve definition.

"
I really like this product. I’ve been trying to get rid of some stubborn weight for a while now and with this product I’m finally seeing a difference. Thanks Innermost!!!*

*Verified customer review.

settings.heading: THE TEAM

We're from all over but headquartered in London where at least one of us was born and raised. Common group activities include quizzes, not being able to decide where to go for lunch, and debates over who looks worse on video calls.

settings.icon_subtext: Innermost ambassadors are a key part of our movement that aims to help people live a more inspired life. They represent Innermost, share content and encourage people to be their most empowered and realise the greatest versions of themselves.

settings.icon_subheading: What are the perks of being an Ambassador
settings.icon_subtext: As an ambassador, you'll not only get exclusive rewards but also cash commission when you introduce people to the brand. You'll also be an important part of our community of likeminded ambassadors who all support each other.

settings.icon_subheading: Who can be an Innermost Ambassador?
settings.icon_subtext: To be an Innermost Ambassador, you must be over 18, and active on social channels such as Instagram and Facebook. To apply simply complete our brand ambassador application, and we'll get right back to you.

settings.icon_subheading: I've made a sale...how do I get paid?
settings.icon_subtext: We do our best to pay our ambassadors as quickly and efficiently as possible. We use Paypal, a reliable online payments system that will get you your money quickly. Head to paypal.com to create your account.

settings.title: Ready?
settings.text: Are you ready to be a part of our community of Innermost ambassadors? Just click the buttons below to either apply or login to your account.

settings.title: #INNERMOSTINSIDER
settings.subtitle: Become a brand ambassador

settings.question: What is an Innermost Insider?
settings.answer:
An Innermost brand ambassador is someone bold, bright and different, who wants to help spread the Innermost message and movement. You’ll be Innermost ride or die, keen to share the brand with your followers and earn cash money along the way, as well as free goodies!

Innermost Brand Ambassadors are friendly and active in their communities, inspiring others to realise the best versions of themselves. Innermost Insiders get early access to content, great perks, 20% off their personal products, and a 10% discount code to share with friends and family. Not to forget 10% cash commission for every sale you help generate! All you need is to be 18 or over and have an active Instagram account - easy right?
settings.question2: Is there a sales quota for ambassadors?
settings.answer2: You decide what it means to be an Innermost ambassador, so no! If you want to earn high commissions, it’s going to take a little more hustling. However, we’re totally aware of how life can get in the way so if you go through a period of inactivity, we’ll be here to support you once you’re back.

settings.question: Brand ambassador rules
settings.answer:
Your inclusion in the program is determined by the Terms and Conditions, containing all the program rules. Have a read through the following FAQs to ensure you’re up to speed with the requirements.

start-list-number

start-itemYou must be 18 or older to be an Innermost brand ambassador.end-item

start-itemDo not share your ambassador code or link on any Innermost social channels or posts.end-item

start-itemSimilarly, do not post your ambassador code on any posts or social channels of Innermost wholesale accounts or retailers who carry our products. Do not go into any of our stockists and share your code with customers. You may be removed from the program if you do so.end-item

start-itemDo not sell any Innermost items yourself, including at any events of any kind.end-item

start-itemDo not share your personal discount code. You do not make any sales commission from it, so it’s not worth it. We will be monitoring the code usage and any unusual activity will be flagged.end-item

start-itemRemember to help spread Innermost’s message and create a supportive environment amongst the other ambassadors. We need your help to bring new clients to the brand.end-item

start-itemAlways be kind, supportive and respectful to other ambassadors.end-item

start-itemYour ambassador code will be automatically generated for you when you apply.end-item

end-list

settings.question: What are the ambassador reward tiers?
settings.answer:
On the Innermost brand ambassador program, the more sales you make, the higher you’ll move through the rewards tier system. Our program currently has 3 tiers.

Bronze Tier: Amazing! You’ve made 5 sales. Keep your eye on your postbox, as you’ll be receiving an Innermost Sweater!

Silver Tier: Congrats! You’ve made 15 sales. You get a free Innermost Collection of your choice!

Gold Tier: 25 sales! Incredible. You’re getting an Innermost bag!

Elite Tier: 40 sales! You're off the charts. An Innermost Habit Journal is on its way to you.

Each time you move up a tier, you’ll receive an email from us. It’s worth noting that the rewards do not reset each year, so you’ll only receive each reward once.
settings.question2: When do we process and send out our rewards?
settings.answer2: We process the rewards once a month around the 15th. If you made a sale anytime in May that qualifies you to reach the next tier, we will process your reward around the 15th of April. Make sure your shipping address is the same by the 7th of every month, otherwise your rewards won’t arrive. We’ll announce when the goods are being shipped out each month via the ambassador Facebook group, so make sure you join.
settings.question3: What to do if your reward never arrived?
settings.answer3:
We send confirmation emails out for rewards, so do keep a close eye on your inbox for this and ensure that the email your account is registered to is correct. If you haven’t received your reward in the post, we’re sorry about that!

If the reward didn’t process due to a system error or if it got lost in shipping, we are able to issue you a replacement. We appreciate your patience as this can take a short while to process.

Just be sure to always keep your shipping address updated. You will miss out on your reward if it’s wrong or outdated, and we don't want that!

settings.question: Refersion account information
settings.answer:
Your ambassador account with Refersion will be your go to for everything you could possibly need! Here you can find your link and referral code, track your sales and commission, update your information. Once your account has been activated and you log in, you’ll receive the following:

start-list start-itemAmbassador Referral Codeend-item start-itemAffiliate Linkend-item start-itemFinancialsend-item start-itemConversion Details end-itemstart-itemPayment Informationend-itemstart-item Payment History end-itemstart-itemAccount Settings and Detailsend-item

end-listAlways ensure you log in via the “Affiliate” log in. If you forget your password, make sure you click the “Forgot Your Password” button. Remember, this account is separate to your liveinnermost.com account you may use for shopping, and you won’t be able to make purchases through your ambassador account.

settings.question: How often will I receive brand ambassador emails?
settings.answer:
Every so often, we’ll send you emails to make sure you’re always in the loop with what’s going on over here at Innermost HQ. You’ll receive the following emails from us:

When you get accepted as an Innermost Ambassador. Make sure you keep this on file for future reference. Our regular ambassador email. We’ll send over any photos for you to share, important info, as well as brand updates. Notification when you move up to the next rewards tier. Processing and tracking emails for your rewards. Keep an eye on these!

If you’re having trouble receiving our emails, do make sure that the email associated with your ambassador account is correct.

settings.question: Your affiliate link
settings.answer: Your Innermost ambassador affiliate shopping link makes it easier for you to share your ambassador code via social media and other digital channels. The link will direct them to the website and automatically applies your ambassador code to their checkout. This will be active for 30 days, meaning that if someone clicks your link, for 30 days after, your code will still be added to their order.

settings.question: How do I receive payment for the sales I help generate?
settings.answer:
We pay ambassador commissions via PayPal to make the payment process as easy as possible. This is a safe, free service which is quick and easy to sign up for. To apply to be an Innermost ambassador in the first place, you’re going to need a PayPal account. Sign up to PayPal here: PayPal

Whilst signing up for the program, you’ll need to enter your PayPal email address into the correct field: “PayPal email”. This is the email associated with your PayPal account.
settings.question2: How can I track the sales I have generated and commission?
settings.answer2: Just log into your ambassador account and you’ll be able to access all of your tracking and commission information there. You won’t be able to see who purchased the order using your link/code but you will be able to see when.
settings.question3: What should I do if I think I’m missing commission?
settings.answer3: Please reach out to hello@liveinnermost.com if you think there’s an issue with your account and/or commission. Be sure to attach the date and conversion ID numbers so we can investigate it, as well as your ambassador account and PayPal email.
settings.question4: Why can I see a negative commission total?
settings.answer4: If you see a negative commission balance on your ambassador account, this is because the customer has returned or cancelled their order. The system will automatically readjust once this is processed.

settings.question: Is it possible to change my code?
settings.answer: The short answer for this is no unfortunately! We only accept your full legal name.
settings.question2: Can my discount code be used in conjunction with other discounts?
settings.answer2: Again, the short answer is no! Customers will only be able to check out on the Innermost site using one discount code. This also applies to your shopping link, where the commission for the sale will be negated if another code is used.
settings.question3: My ambassador code won’t work, what do I do?
settings.answer3: Sorry you’re having trouble with your account! Email us at hello@liveinnermost.com and we’ll look into this for you.

settings.question: How do I cancel my account?
settings.answer: If you wish to cancel your brand ambassador account and leave the program, just send us an email at hello@liveinnermost.com and we’ll handle this for you. You’ll be breaking our hearts but we understand that life can sometimes get in the way. Regardless of that, let's keep in touch.

settings.nootropics_header_content:
Nootropics are substances that improve cognitive function, in particular relating to focus, creativity, memory and information recall. Some nootropics will already feature regularly in your diet (for example L-theanine, the stress reducing amino acid found in tea), whilst others you'll probably need to search a little further afield to get hold of.

Nootropics exist in both synthetic (manmade, e.g. adderall) and natural (i.e. found in nature) forms, and both can have a positive effect on your mental functioning. However, natural nootropics are more widely researched in terms of long-term effects and safety.

Adaptogens are herbs and roots that support your body in handling mental and physical stress. Many ingredients, such as Siberian ginseng, can be considered nootropic as well as adaptogenic.

settings.ingredient_description: A natural amino acid found in tea leaves. It has been shown to induce feelings of calm without causing drowsiness. Found in The Relax Capsules and The Tone Capsules.

A small shrub that has been used in traditional Chinese medicine for thousands of years. Helps to improve mood, reduce adrenal fatigue and improve memory and learning capacity. Found in The Focus Capsules.
An adaptogenic flowering plant that helps your body handle stress more easily. Also proven to boost mental processing and improve attention span. Found in The Focus Capsules and The Fit Protein.
A root vegetable, related to the radish. Boosts mood and regulates stress hormones. Found in The Detox Booster, The Recover Capsules, The Fit Protein and The Energy Booster.
An edible and medicinal mushroom known for its ability to boost mood and reduce anxiety. Found in The Relax Capsules.

settings.product_under_title: Daily nootropic capsules to improve focus.
settings.product_short_description: Containing siberian ginseng. L-tyrosine, bacopa monnieri, CDP-choline & rhodiola rosea.
settings.product_long_description: To be your best, you have to be able to think fast even when you're tired or under pressure. These nootropic capsules contain research-backed ingredients that boost cognitive performance and processing speed while reducing mental fatigue. Be the smartest person in the room.
settings.product_quote: Innermost is well known for redefining performance supplements into clever supportive measures that are free from artificial additives. The Focus Capsules are no different, employing ginseng from Siberia to increase alertness and stave off both mental and physical fatigue. They're also packing CDP-Choline for attention improvement.

settings.product_under_title: Daily nootropic capsules to reduce stress.
settings.product_short_description: Containing lion's mane mushroom, L-glycine, ashwagandha, valerian root, 5-HTP and L-theanine.
settings.product_long_description: Life can be stressful at the best of times, and stress can cause all sorts of unwanted issues. These nootropic capsules contain research-backed ingredients that help reduce stress, promote relaxation, and help you get a great night's sleep. Get some more chill in your life.
settings.product_quote: The closest you'll get to an actual chill pill. Easing anxiety with the use of cortisol-reducing L-Theanine and Lion's Mane Mushroom, which is incidentally also believed to boost learning and mood, it also calls on a range of other ingredients including 5-HTP to help you get a better night's sleep.

settings.About_para_2:
Friends are cool, but what have you done for yours lately? Everyone knows that better health is the best gift you can give anyone. The Innermost Refer A Friend programme helps you do just that.

Not only can you help your friend feel great, they'll get £5 off their first purchase and you'll get £5 off your next order. Just login to your account to get your unique Refer a Friend link.

settings.icon_subtext: Sign up for an account or login to your existing account through the Innermost website.
Access your unique "refer a friend" link in your account dashboard and share it with all your friends.
Your friends will get £5 off their first order, and you'll get enough points for £5 off your next order.
